description: Colgate Total Antibacterial Advanced Whitening Toothpaste removes surface stains for a whiter smile and provides a superior clean with stronger 12 hour bacterial defenseColgate Total Antibacterial Fluoride toothpaste has a unique formula that keeps your whole mouth healthy by fighting bacteria on teeth tongue cheeks and gums for 12 hours Colgate Total Advanced Whitening is formulated to remove surface stains for a whiter smileA Healthier YouEvery day we make it our mission to get you feeling your best  and we believe a healthy mouth makes a difference in being ready for whats aheadSo we are truly excited that youve chosen us to help you step forward confidently into life with a smile thats healthy as can beColgate Total Whole Mouth Health Toothpaste helps toPrevents cavities Remove plaque Protect enamel Prevent tartar buildup Freshen breath Whiten teeth Protect gumsNo Colgate Toothpaste contains Sugar Colgate Total toothpaste are also Vegan Gluten Free and Responsibly MadeRecommended by The Australian Dental Association ADA  New Zealand Dental Association NZDABoxed contents 1 ToothpasteSize 200gWith 4 weeks of continuous usevs a regular fluoride toothpastevs ordinary nonantibacterial fluoride toothpastes with 4 weeks of continued useWHOLE MOUTH HEALTH Brushing with Colgate Total Toothpaste will help improve your teeth tongue cheeks and gum healthSTRONGER 12HOUR BACTERIAL DEFENSE Use Colgate Total Antibacterial Toothpaste for a stronger 12 hour bacterial defenseADVANCED WHITENING Removes surface stains for a whiter smileCAVITY PROTECTION Formula helps to remove plaque with brushing and prevents buildup of cavities and tartarADDITIONAL BENEFITS Freshens breath protects gums and enamel
name: Colgate Total Advanced Whitening Antibacterial Toothpaste 200G
